overview: James Skinford has a plan: steal and flip a mystery truck to make a quick buck and save his ailing father. Everything is cherry pie until when he finds a woman that anyone who touches her becomes immortal.
tagline: James Skinford has a plan: steal and flip a mystery truck to make a quick buck and save his ailing father. Everything is cherry pie until when he finds a woman that anyone who touches her becomes immortal.
title: Skinford: Death Sentence
